Translations.Text: A wid iumnen! Ur pparat d iebiben wid id ilhan, di ddin nnwen, s wurar d utihi, seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, akw seg ijehliyen. Eezzbet i Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ma teddnem i teallit, fellas ad mmaalken, ad uraren. Ayagi, acku nitni d agdud ur nefhim
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Acu i$ef la $ ttehmem, siwa imi numen s Oebbi, akked wayen id Issers $uone$, akked wayen id Issers uqbel? Tegwti degwen d iballa$en

Ini: "ad awen mle$ aqeiii n Oebbi icemten sennig wagi? Wid Ixza Oebbi, sserfan T, Irra ten d iddawen, d ilfawen". Aabden ioebbiten n tkerkas. Widak, atnan di lieala tucmip mavi, di ttelfan u$miq seg ubrid uuwib
Mi d usan $uowen, qqaoen: "numen". Ni$ kecmen d s tijehli, u nitni ff$en yis. Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen, ayen teffren
La tepwaliv aias, degsen, p$awalen ar ubekkav akked wanfal, teppen leeoam. I icmet wayen xeddmen
A lemmer i sen kksen ioabiyen akked lecyax, awal ubekkav akked wucci n leeoam? I icmet wayen la uenaen

Qqaoen wudayen: "iskkweo ufus n Oebbi". D ifassen nnsen i isekkwoen. Pwaxzan ilmend n wayen d qqaoen. Xaii! Ifassen iS llin, Ip$iti akken i S ihwa. Ayen i k d irsen, s$uo Mass ik, war ccekk, irennu i waias segsen, leb$wev akked tijehli. Nessker garasen cceena, akked dd$el, ar ass n tnekra. Yal tikelt ara caalen times i ioad, a p Issexsi Oebbi. Pnadin asefsed di tmurt. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara ifessaden
At Tezmamt, lemmer day umnen u eezzben, yili, war ccekk, Nekkes asen tucmitin nnsen, u Nesskecm iten ar leonanat isaadiyen
Lemmer day iiifen di Tuoa akked Linoil, akked wayen i sen d irsen s$uo Mass nnsen, war ccekk, ad ccen sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaoen nnsen. Illa garasen lois ioeznen. Aias, degsen, dirit wayen xeddmen
